scripts.pkmod: cd logo && node tools/pkdir mod > generated/mod.js
scripts.pkut: cd logo && node tools/pkdir unittests > generated/unittests.js
scripts.pkct: cd logo && node tools/pkdir clitests > generated/clitests.js
scripts.pkdemo: cd logo && node tools/pkdir demo > generated/demo.js
scripts.pkucblogohelp: cd logo && node tools/pkdir UCBLogo > generated/UCBLogo.js
scripts.build: npm run pkdemo & npm run pkut & npm run pkct & npm run pkmod & npm run pkucblogohelp
scripts.unittest: cd logo && node logocli --test --on:verbose && node logocli --test --on:postfix,verbose
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run unittest && npm run clitest
scripts.copy: cp web.config dist/ && cp ace-editor/src/ext-searchbox.js dist/ && cp ace-editor/src/mode-logo.js dist/ && cp ace-editor/src/theme-monokai.js dist/
scripts.release: npx parcel build && npm run removesrcmap && npm run copy
